title: For every people play this game. (Please don't hate.)
body:
Toxic, Rage Quit, Dodge Game, this much of stuff happends to us. we should think what we did good and what we didn't, i am just hoping League of Legends will get a good community for everyone, not a toxic community that makes people hate and do something bad to others make their feeling bad.

As you know, there is lots of kids playing on Leag as well, before we swear, we have to think about it if they are a kid or not maybe before you being toxic, think about why would you do that? because you can't get the lane? that is not make sense, everyone had a chance to play their lane if they gets it, if you didn't just try to be kind and be a support? be a fill? it's not hard, support can do things as well.

In game toxic , rage quit , AFK is a problem as well, one important thing is someone starts dying others will say" oh, you are feeding, stop feeding "and say something stuff to to the guy dead only once or twice, maybe more? but who cares, it's just a game, everyone have their own skill level, you can't make a bronze kid play like a challenger player isn't it? just try to be kind and cheer them up, if you dead accidently if team starts blame you, just say a "Sorry ", it's not hard, team cares about teammate, try to care each other, it's not hard.

I hope this will make people do something cooler thing on the game or with your teammates work better.

If you are the one can start doing that, everyone will gets better on their gaming skill. ect. ;)

replies.body:
First and third paragraph you state a good point. 

The second is complete trash, I will think about myself first rather than a child. If I want to swear I will hold my wish to swear above a child's wish for me to not swear.

Also, draft these in word before you post them, I don't think english is your first language.

Okay first of all you sound like a naive moron.

Secondly, children shouldn't be playing this game in the first place.
But they are in the game so ummhmm? care them a bit? or care people a bit? isnt hard is it
Try to do that ;) you will get it like listen to music to make you feel cool ;) and clam as well
Didn't really need to put that first sentence in, sort of re-enforces his point a bit hmm?

I agree with this, but I just wish that feeders would take my advice and start to defend when behind (e.g. buy some defensive items, ward their lane) instead of charging in looking for retribution kills and continuing to feed. Certainly harassing them is not going to help, try to encourage and give ideas.
The AFK thing usually seems to be a product of either the bad server, or a family member using their internet at the same time. Players need to think ahead before starting a game, that is if they want to win it :)
i am just thinking, if people starts feeding there must be a reason, but if team cares enough and work good enough, they problem can be solved as well, or you get a GG but everyone is happy yea?; )
